abstract: The Macquarie Communications Infrastructure Group agreed to buy the British wireless network division of National Grid for 2.5 billion pounds ($4.93 billion) and combine the unit with its Arqiva broadcast business.
lead_paragraph: The Macquarie Communications Infrastructure Group agreed to buy the British wireless network division of National Grid for 2.5 billion pounds ($4.93 billion) and combine the unit with its Arqiva broadcast business.
